item.title: GCP Bucket as a Distributed Locking Primitive
item.description: I was looking for a simple way to prevent business users executing same slow and expensive action simultaneously. Something like a lock file, but more distributed. And I wasn't very much in the mood of setting up Hazelcast or Zookeper, or a database for this kind of a trivial task.
